title: New Caledonia Sun-Kissed Beachside Resort with Views of Wadra Bay
description: Escape to a tropical paradise of crystal waters and white beaches at InterContinental Lifou Wadra Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel. Explore six hectares of verdant gardens and untouched tropical forest, experience authentic culture or enjoy the serene beauty of the turtle lagoon. As the tropical sun sets on another day, savour traditional Melanesian dishes at Omom restaurant, bury your toes in the white sands of Wadra Bay or retreat to your lavish lodgings for a restful night's sleep.
location_description: InterContinental Lifou Wadra Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel
